org.easybatch.core.api

Interface RecordFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EndWithStringRecordFilter, FileExtensionFilter, GrepFilter, HeaderRecordFilter, JmsPoisonRecordFilter, PoisonRecordFilter, RecordNumberBetweenFilter, RecordNumberEqualsToFilter, RecordNumberGreaterThanFilter, RecordNumberLowerThanFilter, StartWithStringRecordFilter

    public interface RecordFilter
    Interface for record filter. This will be used by the engine to skip record from being processed.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean filterRecord(Record record)
      Return true if the record should be filtered (skipped).

    • Method Detail

      • filterRecord

        boolean filterRecord(Record record)
        Return true if the record should be filtered (skipped).
        Parameters:
        record - the record to filter
        Returns:
        true if the record should be filtered (skipped)
